text:
@SenRickScott PSA: DONT BE LIKE TEXAS, WHERE 
@GovAbbott
 DECLARED CHURCHES & #constructionsites #essentialservices, with NO TESTING OR #SocialDistancing REQUIRED. 
 Impact of those #COVID19 spreading vectors won’t be visible right away.

#WhereAreTheTests 
#WhereAreTheMasks 
#WhereAreThePPE
